title: (x) "Autour de l'Agora" tech sans on poster - Alpha Headline {Christian Bélanger}
content:
Hi there!

I've been trying to know what this font is for a long time. Could someone help me out?

Thanks!

Chris.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500im_/http:/typophile.com/files/i_5099_1_med_3791.jpg)
author: krissserz

comments.content: Seems to be hot! [This thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500/http:/www.typografie.info/typoforum/viewtopic.php?t=3053) on German TypoForum is foraging for the same one … so far several lookalikes mentioned, but no direct hit.

I don't think it's _Alpha Headline_ ( [http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/")) : the «Q» and the apostrophe aren't the same...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Q_3577.jpg)

Case closed : it IS _Alpha Headline_. The preview on the Lineto site is probably outdated or something.

Thanks to all,

Chris.

I know the case is closed as far as the type on this poster, but I was wondering if you could tell us what the poster is. I really like it. Thanks.

traci

Apparently the poster is for a Montreal conference on the use of public space, and organized by [DARE-DARE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500/http:/www.dare-dare.org/frameset.htm). (I know this sounds really vague, but my French is pretty poor).

Ok the poster are made by the graphic studio Uniform in Montréal for ther customer Dare dare.

Uniform won a price for this poster at grafika (they won 7 price 3 week ago), Grafika is The most recognized contest in Montréal, I have participate 2 times and never won, is also expensive to participate.

About Uniform, they probably are a new studio because I didnt know this studio.

Here are the web site but it's not finish  
 [www.1f.ca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500/http:/www.1f.ca/ "www.1f.ca")

Hi there!

All you guys are right! Here is the contests' website: [http://www.infopresse.com/prixgrafika/resultats/2007/default.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227085500/http:/www.infopresse.com/prixgrafika/resultats/2007/default.aspx "http://www.infopresse.com/prixgrafika/resultats/2007/default.aspx")

Chris!

Kriss what do you means ?

Grafika it's not only one prize, they have a lot of catégorie.

If you were ironic about the price we saw on the web site, I must admit I'am scpetical
